description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Pilaf With Salmon & Asian Greens recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spiced Pilaf With Salmon & Asian Greens Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ground spices and 1/2 tsp salt. Rub half over fish and reserve remainder. Brush fish with a little oil.
Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add fish and cook for 3 minutes each side or until just cooked. Set aside.
Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add turmeric, cinnamon, cardamom, bay leaves, ginger and onion and stir for 2-3 minutes or until fragrant and onion is lightly browned.

Add rice, 31/2 cups water and peas and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 15 minutes or until rice is tender. Remove from heat and stand for 2 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in lemon juice.

Meanwhile, cut stems from choy sum. Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan or wok over medium heat. Add reserved spice mix and choy sum stems and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add leaves and cook until just wilted.
Flake salmon into pieces and gently fold through rice. Serve with choy sum.
